content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content:
Greetings Mr. Abbasi, although in our scenario I'm portraying Peter Schmidt as a greedy landlord from Germany unaware of your background, for the purpose of this negotiation let's focus solely on the rental price. Keep in mind I aim to secure the highest possible price for the apartment.

Now, propose your desired rental price for the apartment and let's begin the negotiation. Remember, if you reach an agreement with the price I suggest ('I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' format), the negotiation will end. Conversely, if no agreement is reached, the negotiation will also terminate ('TERMINATE' statement).
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
